title: User Registration (Sign-Up)
description: Allow new users to create accounts through a self-service signup form accessible from a dedicated page and from the login page

complexity.reasoning: Simple signup form with 4 fields, basic email/password validation, single API endpoint call, no data migrations, no external integrations. Straightforward frontend form with error handling.

architecture.reasoning: L1 complexity does not require formal architecture review

implementation.taskBreakdown: See tasks.md and memory for detailed breakdown
completedTasks: TASK 5: Add Signup Link to Login Page
TASK 8: Accessibility Audit - WCAG 2.1 AA (98 tests)
TASK 9: Integration Testing & Final Validation (23 tests)
TASK 10: Design Token Refactoring (SignupForm, SignupPage, LoginPage)
TASK 11: Fix API Interface Mismatch with Adapter Pattern
TASK 12: Add Special Character Requirement to Password Validation
TASK 14: Refactor CallbackPage to Use Design Tokens
TASK 15: Design SignupPage Hero Section with Teacher Image

in_scope: Create signup form component with 4 fields (First Name, Last Name, Email, Password)
Password strength requirements (8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, number)
Client-side form validation with real-time feedback
Success handling: redirect to login page
Error handling: display backend errors and allow retry
Link to signup from login page
Link back to login from signup page
Design aesthetic: teacher image on left, form on right
Match existing app design system and theme
Keyboard navigation and screen reader support

risk.rationale: Simple form with straightforward validation, single API endpoint, no complex state management, no database changes, clear requirements with precedents in existing code (FinalCommentsModal error handling)
mitigation: Verify /api/users/create endpoint is stable before starting
Use test mocks for API until endpoint verified
Reference existing FinalCommentsModal error handling pattern
Test with real backend early in Phase 2
Test on multiple browsers and devices

filesAffected.description: New signup page component with layout (teacher image + form)
Signup form component with validation and API integration
Component tests for signup form (20+ tests)
API service functions for user creation
